title: How do i join chat rooms on the new client
body: like the legacy client how do i join chat rooms without being in a club?

replies.body: *Lew* is correct, unfortunately, this feature hasn't made it into the Beta Client at the moment. I don't work on the team that builds the client, so I cannot speculate if/when you'll see this feature in the New Client, but if you have any other questions, let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ifTBB3or,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-23T02:58:01.919+0000)
>
> *Lew* is correct, unfortunately, this feature hasn't made it into the Beta Client at the moment. I don't work on the team that builds the client, so I cannot speculate if/when you'll see this feature in the New Client, but if you have any other questions, let me know.

Hi Targons Blade, 

I have looked at more then 20 post with the same question and you're the FIRST Riot official that I see answered.  It would be nice if you could tell us what is planned (if you can get the information).  The new client have been enforced on us few week ago, so Legacy client is no more an alternative option to do that. :(  after almost a year of the new client arrival, would be nice to know.  THanks a lot.
Chat rooms aren't implemented into the new client yet so you have to switch back to the legacy client.
